remarks: Projective map of the LUB of a closed subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pmapidcl.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
pmapidcl.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapidcl.c $e |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) $.
pmapidclN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. C ) -> ( M ` ( U ` X ) ) = X ) $.
